meanings.definition: The system or arrangement of muscles in a body or body part.
meanings.sent1: The musculature of the arm helps us lift things.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the musculature of the human body to understand movement.
meanings.sent3: The musculature of the robot was so advanced, it could outlift any human!
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to fitness sculpted her musculature into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The intricate musculature of a cheetah allows it to run incredibly fast.

meanings.definition: The muscular development of an organism or body part.
meanings.sent1: Regular exercise can improve your musculature over time.
meanings.sent2: The athlete's impressive musculature was a result of intense training.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's musculature was so strong, even villains were in awe.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to weightlifting transformed his musculature into a powerhouse.
meanings.sent5: The musculature of a bear is essential for its survival in the wild.
